title: Otherwise Occupied
description: Evan Arden is a hit man for a Chicago mob boss. He lives his life day to day with the company of his dog, Odin. He has to work hard to get back into his boss’s good graces, but the target proves to be difficult. As demons of his past begin to haunt him, he seeks the comfort of sleep from an unlikely candidate, but will confiding in her be his undoing?​​He’s struggling to forget his past, and keep himself Otherwise Occupied.
author: Shay Savage
